data: {"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/lnOGnHqDlZMRGQTEukwWBu5s7fd.jpg","belongs_to_collection":null,"budget":0,"genres":[{"id":16,"name":"Animation"},{"id":10752,"name":"War"},{"id":878,"name":"Science Fiction"}],"homepage":"","id":10857,"imdb_id":"tt0090315","origin_country":["GB"],"original_language":"en","original_title":"When the Wind Blows","overview":"With the help of government-issued pamphlets, an elderly British couple build a shelter and prepare for an impending nuclear attack, unaware that times and the nature of war have changed from their romantic memories of World War II.","popularity":16.174,"poster_path":"/sQ7CgHdDcKnnzhCXA7wC2JVL7qq.jpg","production_companies":[{"id":19261,"logo_path":null,"name":"Penguin Books","origin_country":""},{"id":12745,"logo_path":null,"name":"British Screen Productions","origin_country":"GB"},{"id":15255,"logo_path":null,"name":"TVC London","origin_country":"GB"},{"id":120197,"logo_path":null,"name":"Meltdown Productions","origin_country":""},{"id":6705,"logo_path":"/e8EXNSfwr5E9d3TR8dHKbQnQK4W.png","name":"Film4 Productions","origin_country":"GB"}],"production_countries":[{"iso_3166_1":"GB","name":"United Kingdom"}],"release_date":"1986-10-24","revenue":5274,"runtime":84,"spoken_languages":[{"english_name":"English","iso_639_1":"en","name":"English"}],"status":"Released","tagline":"A horrifying vision of tomorrow.","title":"When the Wind Blows","video":false,"vote_average":7.402,"vote_count":266}
